channel.title: AniDB on Shoko
channel.description: Recent content in AniDB on Shoko

item.title: AniDB Needs Our Help
item.description: The amazing folks over at AniDB have recently announced that their hosting, which had provided for free for many years by a generous member will be coming to an end soon. While the AniDB team have found a replacement host, there is now an issue of how exactly they will pay for this host. AniDB has never once accepted donations or placed Ads on their website and have always provided their content to the masses for free which has been great for everyone.
